algorithm_technique: Calculate angles of hour and minute hands based on time and find the minimum difference.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the smaller angle between the hour and minute hands of a clock.
problem_summary_technical: Compute hand angles using modulo arithmetic and time conversion, then find the minimum angular difference.
key_insights: The hour hand moves 360 degrees in 12 hours, so 30 degrees per hour, and also moves based on minutes.
The minute hand moves 360 degrees in 60 minutes, so 6 degrees per minute.
The key is to correctly calculate the position of the hour hand, which is affected by both the hour and the minutes.
